name: Steering balls [Prototype]
description:
This is a fast-paced rhythm-based arcade android game in which you have to come across many obstacles and avoid them. It consists of a few levels with superbly hard challenges that takes time to master but fun to learn and repeat. Just like “Geometry Dash” game.

Features:
•  Beautiful and minimal 2D graphics and lighting which are affected with the rhythm of the music
•  One finger control
•  Very hard challenging levels
•  Very addictive
•  Easy to learn hard to master
